author: FRONTLINE PBS | Official
description:
How did President-elect Donald Trump's trade war with China play out in his first term? As Trump vows larger tariffs on imported Chinese goods when he takes office for a second time, watch a video drawn from the new FRONTLINE documentary “China, the U.S. & the Rise of Xi Jinping.”

This journalism is made possible by viewers like you. Support your local PBS station here: https://www.pbs.org/donate​

Read more about this video on our website: https://www.pbs.org/wgbh/frontline/article/donald-trump-china-tariffs-trade-war-xi-jinping-video/

For the full story, watch “China, the U.S. & the Rise of Xi Jinping” starting Nov. 26, 2024: https://www.pbs.org/wgbh/frontline/documentary/china-the-u-s-the-rise-of-xi-jinping/

“China, the U.S. & the Rise of Xi Jinping” is a FRONTLINE production with RAIN Media, Inc. The producers are Martin Smith, Marcela Gaviria and Brian Funck. The correspondent is Martin Smith. The co-producers are Scott Anger and Elizabeth Hope Williams. The writers and direc
title: How Trump’s China Trade War Played Out in His First Term | FRONTLINE
